2023-01-01.title: Reflect and pray to God for the New Year.

2023-01-02.title: Make a list of what you have gratitude for.

2023-01-03.title: Make a list of new habits.

2023-01-04.title: Spend at least 20 minutes in quiet time prayer with God.

2023-01-06.title: Connect with God in nature for at least 5 minutes.

2023-01-08.title: Give more than normal in tithe.

2023-01-10.title: Pick one fruit of the spirit to emulate.

2023-01-13.title: Pray for a list of people in your life.

2023-01-15.title: Share a Bible verse with 3 different people.

2023-01-18.title: Do at least 15 minutes of exercise.

2023-01-19.title: Check in on 2 people you have not spoken to you in a while.

2023-01-20.title: Do at least 1 act of kindness for someone.

2023-01-22.title: Pick 1 sinful habit to fast from.

2023-01-25.title: Write a poem, prayer, devotional, etc...

2023-01-27.title: Spend at least 30 minutes in worship and share 1 song.

2023-02-01.title: Pray for a list of people in your life.

2023-02-03.title: Take a quiet moment to reflect on God's presence in your life.

2023-02-06.title: Make a list of new habits to develop.

2023-02-09.title: Practice random acts of kindness for someone.

2023-02-10.title: Spend at least 20 minutes reading the Bible.

2023-02-11.title: Share a Bible verse with 2 people.

2023-02-14.title: Make a list of what you have gratitude for.

2023-02-16.title: Take a walk in nature and connect with God.

2023-02-17.title: Do at least 15 minutes of exercise.

2023-02-18.title: Spend 10 minutes in silent prayer with God.

2023-02-19.title: Write a poem, prayer, or devotional.

2023-02-20.title: Listen to worship music for at least 30 minutes.

2023-02-22.title: Meditate on the fruits of the spirit.

2023-02-23.title: Study a basic doctrine of the faith.

2023-02-24.title: Create a vision board for the future.

2023-02-26.title: Spend time with a friend and pray for them.

2023-02-27.title: Fast from social media for the day.

2023-02-28.title: Offer prayers for the leaders of your country.

2023-02-29.title: Write a letter to someone you miss and include a Bible verse.

2023-02-30.title: Listen to a teaching or sermon online.
